    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_0478bfbb30e11eae3ce6027ea11519deecd77e80</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Speed of sea waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschwindigkeit der Sewellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vitesse des vagues de mer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Velocidade de ondas do mar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Velocità delle onde del mare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταχύτητα των κυμάτων θάλασσας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Velocidad de las ondas del mar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figure illustrates how the speed of sea waves maybe determined by measuring the wavelength of the waves and timing its arrival under the bridge.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">time</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">surface waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung veranschaulicht wie die 
Geschwindigkeit der Sewellen, die möglicherweise indem sie die 
Wellenlänge der Wellen mißt und Zeit seiner Ankunft unter der 
Brücke festgestellt werden, festsetzt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La figure illustre comment la vitesse des vagues 
de mer peut-être déterminées en mesurant la longueur d'onde des 
vagues et en chronométrant son arrivée sous la passerelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A figura ilustra como a velocidade das ondas do 
mar determinadas talvez medindo o wavelength das ondas e cronometrando
sua chegada sob a ponte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura illustra come la velocità delle onde 
del mare forse determinate misurando la lunghezza d'onda delle onde e 
cronometrando il relativo arrivo sotto il ponticello.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αριθμός επεξηγεί πώς η ταχύτητα των κυμάτων 
θάλασσας ίσως που καθορίζονται με τη μέτρηση του μήκους κύματος 
των κυμάτων και του συγχρονισμού η άφιξή του κάτω από τη 
γέφυρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La figura ilustra cómo la velocidad de las ondas
del mar determinadas quizá midiendo la longitud de onda de las ondas 
y midiendo el tiempo de su llegada bajo el puente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
